text: Inge Ejderstedt (born 24 December 1946) is a former Swedish footballer. Inge Ejderstedt began his career in Östers IF and became Swedish champion in 1968. 1970-1974 he played for RSC Anderlecht in Belgium he won the Belgian league in 1972 and 1974. In 1974, he returned to Sweden. As a midfielder Inge Ejderstedt was a member of the Swedish national football team 23 times. He played for Sweden in the 1970 FIFA World Cup and the 1974 FIFA World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Sweden international footballers Category:1970 FIFA World Cup players Category:1974 FIFA World Cup players Category:Östers IF players Category:R.S.C. title: Inge Ejderstedt
